Docs.summary: Splits the Transmission object into two pieces using a method to determine the length of the first piece based off of the length of the transmission.
Docs.returns: A tuple with the first item being a Transmission object with n ITelemetry objects and the second item being a Transmission object with the remaining ITelemetry objects.
